title: No signs of a slowdown in Africa's tech funding, data show - TechCrunch
content: No signs of a slowdown in Africa's tech funding, data show  TechCrunch
description: African startups had a solid Q1 2022 in terms of VC investment, both in dollars and deal volume. This is news in itself, but even more so amid declines in venture funding to the U.S., Asia, and LatAm.
